This module build an apk for Vsdof which is a feature as an plugin of Camera.apk

WHAT IT DOES?
=============
It's a plugin feature of Camera, exists as an independent apk.

HOW IT WAS BUILT?
==================
mmm vendor/mediatek/proprietary/packages/apps/Camera2/feature/mode/vsdof


HOW TO USE IT?
==============
Launch Camera.apk and push Vsdof.apk to /system/vendor/etc/camera folder, launch camera app, you can find it in mode list
